thread.title: client

author: client
title: client
text: I had tons of problems after you took my money down loading panda to my desk top. Desk top ok now. Same problems last year's. I have an Android. I'm suppose to have a total of 3 free attachments. Tons of problems d/l paid panda except for a limited free panda. I need full panda on my android an not the limited free program. This may be last year with panda. You have big problems in D/L your program. Except taking my money. Your lighting fast on that.
